eu.trentorise.opendata.commons

Class ASemVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.ASemVersion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SemVersion

    @Value.Immutable
public abstract class ASemVersion
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Simple class to model a semantic version, see semver.org. This class is used to generate the immutable SemVersion.
    Author:
    David Leoni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ASemVersion() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMajor()
      Returns the major number of the version (i.e. for x.y.z-SNAPSHOT it would be the x)
      int getMinor()
      Returns the minor number of the version (i.e. for x.y.z-SNAPSHOT it would be the y)
      int getPatch()
      Returns the patch number of the version (i.e. for x.y.z-SNAPSHOT it would be the z)
      String getPreReleaseVersion()
      Returns the prerelease version, (i.e. alphanumerical string such as SNAPSHOT, RC1, alpha, ....)
      static SemVersion of(String string)
      Parses a string of the form x.y.z or x.y.z-p, with x,y,z being numbers and p any string.
      String toString()
      Returns a parseable string represention of the semantic version, like i.e. 1.2.3-SNAPSHOT

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • of

        public static SemVersion of(String string)
        Parses a string of the form x.y.z or x.y.z-p, with x,y,z being numbers and p any string.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - on parsing error.
